How many people are affected by adenylosuccinate lyase deficiency ?,"Adenylosuccinate lyase deficiency is a rare disorder; fewer than 100 cases have been reported. The condition is most common in the Netherlands and Belgium, but it has been found worldwide.",GHR,adenylosuccinate lyase deficiency
